Title: Social Media Insights for B2B Leads
Subtitle: Extracting Data from Platforms Like LinkedIn to Identify High-Potential Prospects
Business Impact: By systematically harvesting social media information, sales teams can more effectively engage with decision-makers and influencers, translating into increased conversion rates and shorter sales cycles.
What data was collected: Professional profiles, job titles, work history, and industry affiliations from LinkedIn and similar platforms, focusing on B2B contexts and corporate decision-making roles.
Why this matters: LinkedIn profiles often reflect up-to-date career information, allowing businesses to identify potential leads by role changes, new hires, or expansions—key indicators of a company’s readiness to invest.
Implementation time: 6 to 8 weeks, covering compliance checks, building scraper APIs, and establishing data pipelines into the CRM or marketing automation system.
Problems this solves: 1) Reliance on outdated or unreliable lead databases. 2) Difficulty in discovering new hires or role changes quickly. 3) Limited visibility into the organizational hierarchy of target accounts.
Why it was better to outsource this solu: The outsourced team was well-versed in navigating social media platforms without violating terms of service, using stealthy scraping techniques and respecting data privacy regulations. This limited the risk of account bans and compliance breaches.
Input Schema: A JSON object with the target industry, job roles, and location preferences. Example: { 'industry': 'Software', 'job_roles': ['CTO', 'VP Engineering'], 'locations': ['San Francisco'] }
Output Schema: A JSON array with structured lead information, including profile links and summary stats (years of experience, endorsements). Example: [ { 'name': 'Jane Smith', 'title': 'VP Engineering', 'company': 'TechDrive', 'location': 'San Francisco', 'profile_link': '...' }, ... ]
Matching algorithm used to integrate the: Profile-based scraping that cross-references job roles and industries, applying text classification to filter out irrelevant titles and using location-based matching for regional targeting.
Story:
A global IT solutions provider faced a common challenge: expanding into new markets. Despite having a robust sales team, their approach to identifying and prioritizing leads often felt haphazard. The provider recognized the untapped potential of LinkedIn as a key platform for connecting with professionals and generating high-quality B2B prospects.

To leverage this opportunity, the provider commissioned an outsourced data intelligence service to develop a sophisticated lead generation system. The system was designed to continuously scan LinkedIn profiles, identifying individuals based on several key criteria:

  • Location
  • Job title
  • Experience level
  • Connections to relevant tech communities

The real-time data feed seamlessly integrated with the provider's CRM, ensuring that newly discovered leads and job changes among existing contacts were always up-to-date. This intelligent system became the backbone of the provider's account-based marketing campaigns, enabling timely and well-informed outreach.

For example, when an existing account contact became a CTO at a new firm, the system immediately flagged this transition. Armed with this insight, the provider's sales team could quickly reach out, demonstrating their understanding of the contact's new role and offering tailored solutions. This targeted approach focused on capturing real-time changes in professional roles—one of the strongest indicators of a readiness to adopt new solutions.

By outsourcing the project, the IT solutions provider avoided the technical and regulatory complexities of scraping social media data. The vendor expertly managed best practices to ensure compliance with user privacy and platform terms, allowing the provider's sales teams to focus solely on nurturing relationships with the newly discovered leads.

The results were impressive:

  • Within months, the provider reported a notable uptick in new business opportunities
  • The targeted approach transformed LinkedIn into a fertile source of high-quality B2B prospects
  • The data-driven strategy enabled more strategic and efficient lead generation efforts

By leveraging outsourced data intelligence and focusing on real-time professional changes, the global IT solutions provider successfully broke into new markets and accelerated its growth. This case study demonstrates the power of combining social media insights with a targeted, data-driven approach to B2B lead generation.

industry.description: The target industry for the job search.

job_roles.description: An array of desired job roles.

locations.description: An array of preferred job locations.

title.description: Current job title of the lead

company.description: Current company where the lead works

profile_link.description: URL link to the lead's professional profile

years_of_experience.description: Number of years of professional experience the lead has

endorsements.description: Number of professional endorsements the lead has received
